name: Arcade Party
description:
Arcade Party is an exciting co-op party game where 1-4 players can enjoy tons of arcade inspired mini-games together online or locally.

GAME STAGES


Defeat the arcade machines blocking your way by clearing mini-games. Various effects are waiting for each stage.

15+ VARIETY MINIGAMES


Play mini-games inspired by classic arcade masterpieces. You will be able to clear the mini-game if you use your various abilities.
(The number of minigames is based on Early-Access, and there will be more in the full version)

ONLINE, LOCAL MULTIPLAYER AND SINGLE PLAYER


Up to 4 people can play together on one computer (Controller required). You can also play online if your friends are far away. Also, all mini-games and game modes support single-player.

CHARACTER CUSTOMIZATION


By playing the game and collecting arcade coins, you can customize your character with various costumes.
